description: High-purity aluminum scrap in various grades for smelting and reprocessing.

plates.name: Taint/Tabor (ISRI TAINT)
plates.description: Mixed aluminum scrap with minimal contamination. Suitable for secondary smelting operations.

plates.description: Post-consumer aluminum beverage cans, baled or loose. High recovery rates for can-to-can recycling.

plates.name: Tense (ISRI TENSE)
plates.description: New aluminum scrap from manufacturing processes. Clean, segregated alloys with minimal impurities.

plates.name: 6063 Extrusion Scrap
plates.description: Clean aluminum window frames, extrusions, and profiles. Segregated alloy suitable for direct remelting.

plates.name: Aluminum Wire & Cable
plates.description: Insulated and bare aluminum wire, stripped or whole. Various gauges available for recovery operations.

plates.name: UBC - Used Beverage Cans (Aluminum)
plates.description: Post-consumer aluminum beverage cans ready for recycling. Baled or loose format for high-purity aluminum recovery.

description: Ferrous scrap for electric arc furnace feed and steelmaking applications.

plates.name: HMS 1 & 2 (Heavy Melting Steel)
plates.description: Mixed heavy melting scrap, plate and structural steel. Standard grades for bulk export and steelmaking.

plates.name: Shredded Steel Scrap
plates.description: Auto bodies and appliances processed through shredders. Fragmented ferrous suitable for furnace charging.

plates.name: Bundled Steel
plates.description: Compressed and bundled light gauge steel. Consistent density for efficient shipping and melting.

plates.name: Plate & Structural
plates.description: Heavy steel plate, beams, and structural demolition materials. High-density scrap for blast furnace feed.

plates.name: Turnings & Borings
plates.description: Machining scrap from steel fabrication. Requires processing or briquetting for furnace use.

description: Post-consumer and post-industrial plastic scrap for recycling and reprocessing.

plates.description: Washed and sorted PET from beverage bottles. Clear and colored grades available for fiber or bottle production.

plates.name: HDPE Natural & Colored
plates.description: High-density polyethylene from bottles and containers. Baled, shredded, or regrind forms.

plates.name: LDPE Film Scrap
plates.description: Post-industrial and post-consumer film. Agricultural film, stretch wrap, and packaging materials.

plates.name: PP Polypropylene Scrap
plates.description: Mixed PP from automotive parts, containers, and industrial applications. Regrind or whole bales.

plates.name: ABS & Engineering Resins
plates.description: Electronic housings, automotive trim, and appliance parts. Higher-value engineering plastics.

description: Non-ferrous metals, e-waste, and specialty materials for recovery and recycling.

plates.name: Copper Wire & Cable
plates.description: Insulated and bare copper wire in various gauges. Millberry, birch/cliff grades for smelting.

plates.description: Electronic scrap including motherboards, hard drives, and components. For precious metal recovery.

plates.name: Stainless Steel Scrap
plates.description: 304, 316, and mixed stainless grades. Turnings, solids, and segregated alloys.

plates.name: Lead-Acid Batteries
plates.description: Whole or crushed automotive and industrial batteries. For lead recovery and recycling.

plates.name: Copper Radiators
plates.description: Clean and uncleaned automotive radiators. High copper content for processing.

description: Decommissioned industrial equipment and appliances for scrap or refurbishment.

plates.name: Industrial Machinery
plates.description: Manufacturing equipment, CNC machines, and processing lines. For parts recovery or scrap.

plates.name: Transformers
plates.description: Power distribution transformers with copper windings. Oil-filled and dry types.

plates.name: White Goods
plates.description: Refrigerators, washers, dryers, and appliances. For shredding or component recovery.

plates.name: HVAC Equipment
plates.description: Air conditioners, chillers, and commercial HVAC units. Copper and aluminum content.

description: Industrial cleaning agents, solvents, and specialty chemicals for manufacturing applications.

plates.description: Solvent-based and aqueous degreasers for metal cleaning and surface preparation. Bulk quantities available.

plates.name: Specialty Coatings & Lubricants
plates.description: Industrial lubricants, cutting fluids, and protective coatings for metalworking and manufacturing.

description: Recyclable packaging materials and paper products for reprocessing.
